overview.description: This course provides expertise in data analysis, machine learning, and big data technologies.

entry_requirements.requirements: Applicants should hold a 2:1 degree in a relevant field and meet English language proficiency.

course_content.description: The curriculum includes modules on data mining, statistical modeling, and AI.

teaching_and_research.description: Research-led teaching with practical data science applications in various industries.

careers.description: Graduates find roles in data science, analytics, and consultancy across various sectors.

course: MSc Advanced Computer Science with Business

overview.description: This program blends technical computer science knowledge with business acumen, ideal for students seeking leadership roles in tech-driven businesses.

entry_requirements.requirements: Applicants should have a 2:1 degree in a relevant field and meet English language proficiency requirements.

course_content.description: Covers topics in computer science and business, with modules on AI, project management, and entrepreneurship.

teaching_and_research.description: Delivered through lectures, workshops, and independent research, supported by leading academics.

careers.description: Graduates are well-prepared for roles in tech businesses, consulting, and entrepreneurship.

overview.description: Focused on understanding and managing cyber risks using analytics and artificial intelligence.

entry_requirements.requirements: A 2:1 degree in computer science or a related field, along with English language proficiency.

course_content.description: Includes modules on cyber threats, big data analytics, and network security.

teaching_and_research.description: Research-led teaching with a focus on practical applications and real-world scenarios.

careers.description: Graduates are equipped for roles in cyber security analysis, consulting, and risk management.

how_to_choose_accommodation.overview: Guides to help students consider various factors when selecting accommodation, including location, budget, and type of residence.

room_finder.overview: Tool to explore different types of rooms available for the 2024-25 academic year with details on facilities and prices.

applying_and_paying.overview: Information on how to apply for accommodation, payment methods, and important deadlines.

moving_in.overview: Tips and essential information for preparing to move into university accommodation.

contact.overview: Contact details for the accommodation office for any queries or support.

private_accommodation.overview: Guidance on finding and securing private accommodation outside of university-managed properties.
